name: Sync (DefinitelyNotAShark)
description:
SYNC

You've been practicing for this performance for a while! Don't mess it up. Your friends are all better at dancing than you, but for some reason, they let you perform with them this time. All you have to do, is dance to the beat!

Press the correct arrow keys in the right order to strike a pose! Your friends will let you know whether you are correct or not. How well you do will effect your rating at the end!

This is a short rhythm game made in Unity. The sound and the timers aren't completely set up correctly, but if you want to play around with it, it's free.
